definition: Persian silk tree (Albizia julibrissin)/tree rhododendron (Rhododendron delavayi)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
tassel/sth shaped like a tassel (e.g. a leaf etc)/ribbon
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: An old man was dozing under a nearby hibiscus tree.
sentences.chinese: 在附近的馬纓花樹下，一位老人正坐着打瞌睡。
